KermitRevelation: ^Kermit cries and looks to you with wet eyes.
^Kermit: I think...that was meant to happen to me. I think. I've been held back by my fears.
^Kermit: I think this is a sign to let go of them and not be afraid to move on.
^Kermit: I think I need to let Miss Piggy go once and for all.
^Kermit: I'm supposed to take a walk on the wild side and go on an adventure. Maybe across the world?
^Kermit: I need to be brave and not be afraid of my fragility.
^You: You may have a fragile nature, but your spirit is so big and brave.
^You: I'm happy you will let yourself explore the world without fear.
